# datePickerElements

**Instance Property**

A bitmask that indicates which visual elements are shown by the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var datePickerElements: NSDatePicker.ElementFlags { get set }
```

## Discussion

Elements not included in the bitmask are hidden from view. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDatePicker/ElementFlags].

## Configuring Appearance

- **backgroundColor**: The cell’s background color.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws its background.
- **textColor**: The cell’s text color.
- **datePickerStyle**: The date picker style to use.
